feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -19.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -22.6°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries later this morning and late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
